analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/44/0x721b5a1bcaf5da7d8f86fba75f54eebd461d3380.sol:
	Contract HITestToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/44/0x721b5a1bcaf5da7d8f86fba75f54eebd461d3380.sol#221)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/44/0x721b5a1bcaf5da7d8f86fba75f54eebd461d3380.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/44/0x721b5a1bcaf5da7d8f86fba75f54eebd461d3380.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/44/0x721b5a1bcaf5da7d8f86fba75f54eebd461d3380.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
